General.Name: Taiwan Navigation Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Navigation Co., Ltd. provides shipping services in Taiwan. It offers passenger and freight transportation services through water; port warehousing; aquatic sand mining; and navigation channel dredging services, as well as acts as a shipping agency and provides tugboats. The company also acts as a land owner in agreements with construction companies for the use of its land for the construction of residential and commercial buildings for sale and rental. As of December 31, 2021, it operated 30 vessels. Taiwan Navigation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No 29, Chi Nan Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 100
